roleset.name: uninvite, rescind an invitation

example.name: with cause
example.text: Bill Frist because he 's changed his position on stem cell research has been disinvited by the family Research Council to what they 're calling *T* *PRO* their Second Justice Sunday.
example.arg: because he 's changed his position on stem cell research
to what they 're calling *T* *PRO* their Second Justice Sunday.

roleset.note: DISINVITE-V NOTES: Frames created by Arrick (from disinvite.01-v)
